mapper.select: select * from dms.tb_dealer_relation where parent_dealer_id = #{parent_dealer_id} and dealer_id = #{dealer_id}
mapper.update: update dms.tb_dealer_relation set parent_dealer_id=#{parent_dealer_id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select dealer_id,dealer_name,dealer_code from dms.tb_dealer where category_id = 4

select * from( select tdr.*,td1.dealer_name,td1.dealer_code,td1.business_contacts,td1.business_phone,td2.dealer_name as parent_dealer_name, td2.dealer_code as parent_dealer_code from dms.tb_dealer_relation tdr LEFT JOIN dms.tb_dealer td1 ON tdr.dealer_id=td1.dealer_id LEFT JOIN dms.tb_dealer td2 ON tdr.parent_dealer_id=td2.dealer_id ) y
